translation.en: Hello?
- Turn him over. - Is he alive?
Can you hear me?
Hey.
Hey. Where are you? I've been calling for an hour.
translation.fr: Où es-tu ? Une heure que je t'appelle.

translation.en: Lorna, you're not my wife anymore.
translation.fr: Lorna, tu n'es plus ma femme.

translation.en: Thanks for that, Mick,
I still get confused. Some days, I think I am your wife.
translation.fr: Je m'y perds. Soit je crois être ta femme,

translation.en: Others, I'm more like your mother.
Don't do that. Think I can't tell when you're holding the phone away?
translation.fr: Arrête. Je sais quand tu éloignes le téléphone.

translation.en: What I am is a person who runs this practice,
translation.fr: En réalité, je suis celle qui dirige ce cabinet,

translation.en: what's left of it anyway,
and as such, I need to be able to reach you.
translation.fr: et donc, tu dois être joignable.

translation.en: Okay, you reached me. What's the problem?
translation.fr: Très bien, je suis là. Qu'y a-t-il ?

translation.en: We got a call from Judge Holder.
- She wants to meet with you ASAP. - The Chief Judge?
translation.fr: - Elle veut te voir. - La juge en chef ?

translation.en: Technically, the presiding judge. Tell me you're not sleeping with her.
translation.fr: La présidente du tribunal. Tu ne couches pas avec elle, si ?

translation.en: No. Why would you even say that?
The only reason you'd be called to the private chambers of a female judge
translation.fr: Parce que si une juge femme te convoque à son bureau,

translation.en: is, A, you have a case before her, or B, you have a personal relationship.
translation.fr: soit tu dois lui parler d'un procès, soit tu couches avec.

translation.en: And since you haven't had any cases for a year…
translation.fr: Comme tu n'as eu aucune affaire en un an…

translation.en: I never even met the woman.
translation.fr: Je ne la connais même pas.

translation.en: - She wants to meet with you now. - But she didn't say what it was about?
translation.fr: - C'est urgent. - Elle n'a pas dit pourquoi ?

translation.en: No. But can we please allow for the possibility
this might be positive?
Maybe she wants to assign you a case pro bono.
translation.fr: Elle a peut-être une affaire pro bono.

translation.en: - Work begets work. - Well, maybe.
Mick?
Still here.
Drive one of the Lincolns.
They're in storage.
Get one out of storage. The Lincoln becomes you.
translation.fr: Prends-en une. La Lincoln devient toi.

translation.en: And you become you.
Should this present as a real opportunity, you gotta go in there full Mickey Haller.
translation.fr: Si c'est une réelle opportunité, présente-toi en Mickey Haller au top.

translation.en: All right.
Hey.
You've got Hayley tonight. Just calling to remind.
translation.fr: Tu as Hayley ce soir. N'oublie pas.

translation.en: 'Cause you think I'll forget?
Six o'clock, okay? Not 6:10. Not 6:05.
Who's the lucky guy? Do I know him?
6:00 p.m. sharp, Mickey.
I got it.
Hey, what can you tell me about Judge Mary Holder?
translation.fr: Que sais-tu sur la juge Mary Holder ?

translation.en: Why?
I don't know. She called me to her chambers.
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas. Elle m'a convoqué.

translation.en: - Did you do something? - No, I haven't done something.
translation.fr: - Tu as fait quelque chose de mal ? - Non.

translation.en: Then why would she call you to chambers?
I don't know, which is why I'm asking. What can you tell me about her?
translation.fr: Justement, je n'en sais rien. Alors, que sais-tu sur elle ?

translation.en: She's got a bug up her ass the size of the legal canon of ethics,
translation.fr: Elle n'est pas du genre à plaisanter.

translation.en: which makes me think you've done something.
translation.fr: Donc tu as fait quelque chose.

translation.en: - Thanks. - Wait, Mickey--
I'll see you tonight.
He's done something.
Oh, hello, Mick.
- Lorna. - I was driving this way anyway.
- No. You're checking up. - Says who?
You look good. I have always loved this one.
translation.fr: Tu en jettes. J'adore ce costume.

translation.en: What are you doing here?
This could be a very big deal.
She's the presiding judge. So I came down to gather intel.
translation.fr: C'est la juge en chef. Je suis venue m'informer.

translation.en: And?
Most of her work is administrative, which judge goes where and so forth.
translation.fr: Elle gère surtout l'administratif, quel juge va où et tout.

translation.en: And?
And… she assigns cases.
- If that's what this is about… - You don't want me to blow it.
translation.fr: - S'il s'agit de ça… - Je ne dois pas tout gâcher.

translation.en: I'm just saying, whatever this is, it has to go well. Okay?
translation.fr: Je dis juste que ça doit bien se passer. Vu ?

translation.en: Mr. Haller, I presume.
Judge Holder.
I don't believe we've met before.
translation.fr: On ne se connaît pas, je crois.

translation.en: No, Your Honor.
Well, come on then.
The Lincoln Lawyer, that what they call you?
translation.fr: On vous appelle la Défense Lincoln ?

translation.en: Some do, yes.
Or did.
Why?
Mainly worked out of my car. Going from court to court.
translation.fr: Je bossais dans ma voiture. J'allais de tribunal en tribunal.

translation.en: All the driving and so forth.
Being ready to flee the jurisdiction if need be.
translation.fr: Prêt à fuir la juridiction au cas où.

translation.en: Never fled the jurisdiction.
Have a seat.
What's your relationship with Jerry Vincent?
translation.fr: Quel lien avez-vous avec Jerry Vincent ?

translation.en: Jerry Vincent?
Uh, I used to go up against him back when he was a prosecutor.
translation.fr: On s'affrontait du temps où il était procureur.

translation.en: And he switched sides.
translation.fr: Puis, il a changé de camp.

translation.en: He was murdered last night.
translation.fr: Il a été tué hier soir.

translation.en: Excuse me?
Shot dead in his car.
What?
If you were close, please accept my condolences,
translation.fr: Mes condoléances si vous étiez proches,

translation.en: but that's not why you're here.
translation.fr: mais vous n'êtes pas là pour ça.

translation.en: Were you close?
I mean, friendly. Colleagues, mostly.
He left you his practice.
I beg your pardon?
Mr. Vincent filed a motion with the court ten days ago
translation.fr: Me Vincent a déposé une requête il y a dix jours

translation.en: that allowed for the transfer of his entire practice to you,
translation.fr: pour que tout son cabinet vous soit légué

translation.en: should he become incapacitated or deceased.
translation.fr: en cas d'incapacité ou de décès.

translation.en: - He never discussed this with you? - No.
translation.fr: - Il ne vous a jamais rien dit ? - Non.

translation.en: Well, last night he became deceased, which means what was his is now yours.
translation.fr: Il est décédé hier soir, donc ce qui était à lui vous appartient.

translation.en: Including the Trevor Elliott trial.
You have heard of that?
The tech guy who killed his wife and her boyfriend.
translation.fr: L'informaticien qui a tué femme et amant.

translation.en: Allegedly.
Of course.
That's now my case?
They're all your cases, Mr. Haller.
translation.fr: Vous reprenez tous les dossiers, Me Haller.

translation.en: You might not get to keep them.
Every client has a right to move on to another attorney
translation.fr: Les clients ont le droit de changer d'avocat

translation.en: once apprised of Mr. Vincent's demise.
translation.fr: sachant que Me Vincent est mort.

translation.en: What it does mean is you get first shot.
Assuming I'm satisfied that Mr. Vincent's clients
translation.fr: Si cela me convient que les clients de Me Vincent

translation.en: are being transferred to a replacement counsel
translation.fr: soient transférés à un avocat substitutif

translation.en: of good standing and competent skill.
As far as I can tell,
you haven't had any cases in quite some time.
translation.fr: vous n'avez pas travaillé depuis longtemps.

translation.en: Yeah.  I was in an accident about 18 months ago.
translation.fr: Oui. J'ai eu un accident il y a 18 mois de ça.

translation.en: Surfing, if you can believe it.
I had multiple surgeries and, well, there were complications.
translation.fr: J'ai subi plusieurs opérations, et il y a eu des complications.

translation.en: Complications?
I took painkillers. Got addicted to 'em. But that's over now. I got help.
translation.fr: J'ai pris des analgésiques. J'étais accro, mais c'est fini. Je me suis fait aider.

translation.en: Got clean. So whatever concerns you may have about my reputation, I--
translation.fr: J'ai décroché. Si vous vous en faites pour ma réputation…

translation.en: It's my reputation I'm concerned about. I'm the one that has to sign off on you.
translation.fr: C'est la mienne qui m'inquiète. Je dois vous donner mon approbation.

translation.en: Or not.
Why you?
Of all the lawyers out there.
Honestly, Your Honor, I have no idea.
translation.fr: À dire vrai, je n'en ai aucune idée.

translation.en: Well, if you were to guess?
Well, as I said, Jerry and I were friendly,
translation.fr: Je vous l'ai dit, on se connaissait,

translation.en: we trusted each other.
And second, though this is subjective,
when I am right, there's no better criminal defense attorney in Los Angeles
translation.fr: quand j'ai raison, il n'y a pas meilleur défenseur à Los Angeles,

translation.en: and Jerry knew that from personal experience.
And you think you're right now?
translation.fr: Vous pensez avoir raison en ce moment ?

translation.en: I do.
This is an order
transferring Mr. Vincent's practice to you.
I can rescind it just as fast.
translation.fr: Je peux l'annuler tout aussi vite.

translation.en: I will be monitoring you, Mr. Haller.
translation.fr: Je vais vous tenir à l'œil.

translation.en: I want an updated inventory of cases by the beginning of next week.
translation.fr: Je veux un inventaire à jour pour le début de la semaine.

translation.en: After that, a bi- weekly status update
translation.fr: Après ça, un compte-rendu tous les 15 jours

translation.en: of every case on which you will remain counsel.
translation.fr: de toutes les affaires que vous conserverez.

translation.en: - Am I clear? - I won't let you down, Your Honor.
translation.fr: - C'est compris ? - Je ne vous décevrai pas.

translation.en: Don't let your clients down.
I suggest you get to Mr. Vincent's office right now.
translation.fr: Je vous suggère de vous rendre immédiatement à son cabinet.

translation.en: The police are, no doubt, searching it
and probably invading their privacy as we speak.
translation.fr: et porter atteinte à leur vie privée.

translation.en: Thank you, Your Honor.
Good luck, Mr. Haller.
Well, did you get a case?
translation.fr: Alors ? Elle t'a confié une affaire ?

translation.en: I just got a lot of them.
Including Trevor Elliott.
What?
I need to meet the clients,
get their sign- offs, but I might be back, Lorna.
translation.fr: donnent leur approbation, ça pourrait le faire.

translation.en: I might actually be back.
What did I tell you about positive visualization?
translation.fr: J'ai dit quoi sur la visualisation positive ?

translation.en: You wake up, not a single client.
Now, you are repping a guy like Trevor Elliott in a murder trial.
translation.fr: Et voilà que tu représentes Trevor Elliott.

translation.en: If he decides to keep me.
Positive thinking, Mickey. Positive thinking.
- Floor is closed, folks. - We have business on this floor.
translation.fr: - L'étage est fermé. - On a du travail ici.

translation.en: - Not today, you don't. - Talk to the judge.
Need to see some ID.
You know, you don't help yourselves being dicky- do's.
translation.fr: Jouer les plaies ne vous aidera pas.

translation.en: Just saying.
- Can I help you? - Mickey Haller. I'm an attorney.
translation.fr: - Oui ? - Mickey Haller. Je suis avocat.

translation.en: I've taken over Mr. Vincent's practice.
You need to come back tomorrow. This is a crime scene. It's sealed off.
translation.fr: Revenez demain. C'est une scène de crime. Accès interdit.

translation.en: The crime scene was a parking garage, not this office.
translation.fr: La scène du crime était un parking, pas ce cabinet.

translation.en: There are client files here I need to access and apparently safeguard.
translation.fr: Je dois voir des dossiers. Et les protéger, semble-t-il.

translation.en: What'd you say your name was?
Mickey Haller. This is Lorna Crane. She works with me.
translation.fr: Mickey Haller. Voici ma collègue, Lorna Crane.

translation.en: Well, Mickey Haller and Lorna Crane,
I need you to both leave. Now.
- Dicky- do's, I'm telling you. - What was that?
That wasn't meant for you. But if you heard me, you heard me.
translation.fr: Je ne parlais pas de vous. Mais vous avez entendu.

translation.en: You're contaminating a crime scene. You can't be here.
translation.fr: Vous contaminez une scène de crime. Partez.

translation.en: This order will confirm I've been appointed
by the presiding judge of the Superior Court
translation.fr: par la juge en chef de la cour supérieure

translation.en: as replacement counsel to Jerry Vincent's clients.
That means his cases are now my cases,
and you have no right to be in here looking through files.
That's attorney- client privilege.
Mr. Vincent's been murdered. The motive could be in one of these files.
translation.fr: Me Vincent a été assassiné. Ces dossiers pourraient aider.

translation.en: - Even if that were the case-- - Counselor--
Just read the order, Detective.
Your crime scene is out in the garage
translation.fr: On l'a tué dans un parking,

translation.en: and no judge in LA would extend it to this office and these files.
translation.fr: et aucun juge ne donnera accès à ces dossiers.

translation.en: You say this gives you all of Mr. Vincent's cases?
translation.fr: Toutes les affaires de Me Vincent vous reviennent ?

translation.en: That's right.
- Then that puts you on our list. - Come again.
translation.fr: - Vous entrez dans la liste. - Pardon ?

translation.en: Our suspect list.
He's dead and you get the whole business?
translation.fr: Il est mort, et tout le cabinet vous revient ?

translation.en: That's motive, ask me.
Care to tell us where you were last night between 8:00 and midnight?
translation.fr: Où étiez-vous hier soir entre 20 h et minuit ?

translation.en: You got me, Detective. You got me.
I killed Jerry. Case closed, everybody.
translation.fr: J'ai tué Jerry. Affaire classée, tout le monde.

translation.en: Clearly you've done this before.
Are you gonna get out of here, or do I need to call the judge?
translation.fr: Vous allez dégager, ou bien j'appelle la juge ?

translation.en: - Guys. - Nice to meet you, too.
- Bye. - Let's go.
Leave everything.
What?
All right. Come on.
Sometimes I think they teach it in the academy,
translation.fr: Ils doivent enseigner à l'école de police

translation.en: how to piss people off.
When you think of all the bad blood between the people and police,
translation.fr: Vu l'animosité qui règne entre les gens et la police,

translation.en: you'd think how not to piss people off would be in the curriculum.
translation.fr: comment ne pas agacer les gens devrait être au programme.

translation.en: How would you feel about me hiring Cisco?
He's a good investigator. One of the best I've worked with.
translation.fr: C'est un bon enquêteur. Un des meilleurs.

translation.en: Working with your ex- wife is one thing,
hiring her boyfriend is pushing it, even for you.
translation.fr: mais embaucher son copain, tu y vas fort.

translation.en: If Trevor Elliott decides to keep me,
I'm gonna need to move fast
with an investigator I can trust, and Cisco--
translation.fr: avec un enquêteur fiable, et Cisco…

translation.en: Yeah, Mickey Haller.
Yes, sir. 2:00 p.m. As in 2:00 p.m. today?
translation.fr: D'accord, 14 h. Aujourd'hui, vous voulez dire ?

translation.en: Yes, sir, I'll be there. Thank you.
Who was that?
It's Judge Canter's clerk. It seems Jerry has a trial today.
translation.fr: Le greffier du juge Canter. J'ai une audience aujourd'hui.

translation.en: - What? - Yep.
- Are you gonna eat your sandwich? - No, Lorna, you can have it.
translation.fr: - Tu comptes manger ton sandwich ? - Non, prends-le.

translation.en: Thank you. Run.
Hey.
- I'm covering for Jerry Vincent. - Oh, I heard.
translation.fr: - Je remplace Jerry Vincent. - Il paraît.

translation.en: Sorry. What's the name?
And your client's name?
Right.
It's, uh… Letts, first name Izzy.
I think it's a theft.
That would be Marc Daniels,
who I'm covering for, so that's actually mine.
translation.fr: que je remplace, donc c'est mon dossier.

translation.en: - Grand theft, by the by. - Obviously I'm gonna need a continuance.
translation.fr: - Vol de grande envergure. - Il me faut une prorogation.

translation.en: Obviously I'm not gonna give it to you.
translation.fr: Que je ne vous accorderai pas.

translation.en: - What? - I got out- of- town witnesses.
translation.fr: - Quoi ? - Les témoins viennent de loin.

translation.en: I'd rather they be pissed off with the judge or you than me,
translation.fr: Mieux vaut qu'ils en veuillent au juge ou à vous,

translation.en: especially if I wanna get them back.
LA- 292587. People vs. Izzy Letts.
And we're on.
Sarah Shepard for the People, Judge. Ready for trial.
translation.fr: Sarah Shepard pour l'État. Prête pour l'audience.

translation.en: Mickey Haller for the defendant, Your Honor.
I'll be with you in one second. May I approach?
Your Honor, Mr. Vincent unexpectedly passed yesterday.
translation.fr: Me Vincent est mort soudainement hier.

translation.en: I'm filing in.
My sincere condolences. When will you be ready?
- Well… - Don't be greedy.
It's a bench trial with two witnesses.
translation.fr: C'est un procès avec deux témoins.

translation.en: Out- of- town witnesses, who I'll lose with a continuance.
translation.fr: Pas d'ici. Je les perdrai avec une prorogation.

translation.en: How's tomorrow?
Tomorrow?
Look at the file.
If you feel like you can't be ready, let me know.
Step back.
This case is continued until tomorrow, 10:00 a.m.
- Wait, what? - Sir?
Your Honor, we flew down here from San Francisco.
translation.fr: M. le juge, on est venus de San Francisco.

translation.en: - This is not fair. - I'm afraid we have an emergency.
translation.fr: - C'est injuste. - Nous avons une urgence.

translation.en: What about the victims? We had an emergency.
translation.fr: Et les victimes ? Il y avait urgence pour nous.

translation.en: My wife was attacked, for God's sake.
translation.fr: Ma femme a été agressée, bon Dieu.

translation.en: She had her necklace violently snatched off her person.
translation.fr: On lui a arraché un collier violemment.

translation.en: And the court is sympathetic, but it's unavoidable.
translation.fr: Et la cour comprend, mais c'est inévitable.

translation.en: This case is pushed over until tomorrow at 10:00 a.m.
translation.fr: Cette audience est repoussée à demain, 10 h.

translation.en: Victims have no rights in this process.
- Yeah. Excuse me. - That's what she stole?
At least your client has taste.
- Mickey Haller. I'm your attorney. - Where's Jerry?
translation.fr: - Mickey Haller. Votre avocat. - Où est Jerry ?

translation.en: Why don't we go someplace we can talk?
translation.fr: Si on allait parler en privé ?

translation.en: He was such a nice man.
He wasn't even charging me.
At least, not yet.
Why would somebody kill him?
I don't know. The police are still gathering evidence.
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas. La police enquête toujours.

translation.en: What kind of world is this?
I got to be ready on your case by tomorrow.
translation.fr: Je dois me préparer pour votre procès.

translation.en: - So anything-- - I did not attack her.
translation.fr: - Alors, si… - Je ne l'ai pas agressée.

translation.en: I snatched the necklace and ran. I did not attack her.
translation.fr: J'ai volé son collier et filé. Je ne l'ai pas agressée.

translation.en: Okay. And is there a reason Jerry didn't try to plead this?
translation.fr: Bien. Et pourquoi Jerry n'a pas voulu plaider ça ?

translation.en: 'Cause they wanted two years. And Jerry said it was excessive.
translation.fr: Ils demandaient deux ans. Jerry disait que c'était trop.

translation.en: He thought with a trial, I could at least impress the judge
translation.fr: Il pensait qu'au procès, j'impressionnerais le juge

translation.en: with my extenuating circumstances.
Which are?
I'm a good person. Who had a drug problem.
translation.fr: Je suis quelqu'un de bien avec un passé de toxico.

translation.en: It wasn't me who stole that necklace,
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas volé le collier.

translation.en: so much as somebody I don't even recognize.
translation.fr: C'était quelqu'un que je ne reconnais pas.

translation.en: Somebody who's gone.
I went through rehab.
I'm in recovery.
I believe you.
But I don't know if that other person's ever really gone.
translation.fr: Mais pas sûr que l'autre personne n'existe plus.

translation.en: Mine was oxy.
You?
Same, basically.
Heroin.
Which I switched to when I couldn't afford the oxy anymore.
translation.fr: Après que l'oxycodone est devenu trop cher.

translation.en: So, Jerry planned to put you up there?
And introduce my good personhood status into evidence.
translation.fr: Et mettre en valeur ma bonne personnalité.

translation.en: The trial is tomorrow, you say?
Bench trial, two witnesses. I think I'm good.
translation.fr: Sans jury, deux témoins. Ça ira.

translation.en: Call Marvin Beedleman, tell him I need a favor.
translation.fr: Appelle Marvin Beedleman, il me doit bien ça.

translation.en: He's pushing 80, you might have to remind him he owes me.
translation.fr: Il approche les 80, rappelle-lui qu'il m'est redevable.

translation.en: Got anything on Trevor Elliott?
Jerry took a retainer of $625,000, most of which seems to be gone.
translation.fr: Jerry a touché un acompte de 625 000 $, presque totalement envolé.

translation.en: He's due another 450 at trial. Non- refundable.
translation.fr: Et 450 000 $ de plus au procès. Non remboursables.

translation.en: - Wow. - I know. It's like a year's worth of DUIs.
translation.fr: Je sais. Ça couvre une année d'ivresses au volant.

translation.en: It's a franchise case.
- Who's the judge? - James P. Stanton.
He's an ex- defense attorney, so that's good. Are you almost there?
translation.fr: Ex-avocat de la défense, donc c'est bien. Tu arrives ?

translation.en: - Your appointment's at 3:00. - I'm pulling up.
translation.fr: - Tu as rendez-vous à 15 h. - Je me gare.

translation.en: Do we know for sure Elliott hasn't already hired another lawyer?
translation.fr: On est sûrs qu'Elliott n'a pas un autre avocat ?

translation.en: Don't worry about any other lawyer. Just go.
translation.fr: N'y pense pas. Contente-toi d'y aller.

translation.en: All right.
Hey.
Your name?
Nice car, man.
Thanks.
- Thank you. - I got it.
Mr. Haller.
Go right up. He's waiting for you.
Sure you don't need anything? Water…
translation.fr: Vous ne voulez rien ? De l'eau…

translation.en: I'm fine. Thank you.
Mr. Elliott's in his office?
His office?  No.
Mr. Elliott.
Mickey Haller. How you doing?
Mr. Elliott?
I stand trial for murder next week.
My attorney's just been shot dead.
You can probably imagine how I might be doing.
translation.fr: Vous pouvez imaginer comment je vais.

translation.en: Do they know anything? Any suspects?
Not to my knowledge, no.
I'm told they wanna interview all of his clients.
translation.fr: Ils veulent interroger tous ses clients.

translation.en: Obviously, I wouldn't advise you talk to them
while this other matter is pending.
What, are they gonna charge me with killing Jerry too?
translation.fr: Ils vont aussi m'accuser d'avoir tué Jerry ?

translation.en: Why not? It's open fucking season.
translation.fr: Pourquoi pas ? La chasse est ouverte.

translation.en: So, who are you? How come I've never heard of you?
translation.fr: Qui êtes-vous ? Je ne vous connais pas.

translation.en: You've never heard of me
because I make it a practice not to be heard of.
Celebrity lawyers bring too much attention to their clients.
translation.fr: Sans ça, on attire l'attention sur les clients.

translation.en: I don't operate that way.
Now as my case manager explained, Jerry transferred his practice to me.
translation.fr: Comme l'a dit mon assistante, je reprends le cabinet de Jerry.

translation.en: If you look at the contract of representation you signed with him,
translation.fr: D'après le contrat que vous avez signé,

translation.en: you'll see it allowed Jerry to discuss your case with me.
translation.fr: Jerry pouvait me parler de votre affaire.

translation.en: Did he? Discuss it with you?
No. The point I'm making, Jerry trusted me.
translation.fr: Non. Mais il me faisait confiance.

translation.en: It doesn't mean I have to.
No, it does not.
- It's Mickey, is it? - That's right.
You play any basketball, Mickey?
- A little bit. - I don't.
Not really.
I love to watch though.
But it always drove me crazy
seeing great players struggle with free throws.
translation.fr: de voir de super joueurs en baver aux lancers francs.

translation.en: It's the one thing you can control. Every shot, exactly the same.
translation.fr: La seule chose qu'on peut contrôler. Toujours le même tir.

translation.en: Take your time, line it up.
translation.fr: On prend son temps, on vise.

translation.en: And yet, time and chance happen to them all.
translation.fr: Mais le temps et la chance influent sur tout le monde.

translation.en: I don't mean to be an asshole.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas un enfoiré.

translation.en: Or maybe I do. We were set to go to trial next week.
translation.fr: Ou bien si. Le procès était pour la semaine prochaine.

translation.en: I've been waiting five months to clear my name.
translation.fr: Cinq mois que je veux blanchir mon nom.

translation.en: - I understand. - Do you?
You understand what it's like for an innocent man
translation.fr: Vous savez comment c'est pour un innocent

translation.en: to have to wait and wait to have his day in court?
translation.fr: de devoir attendre son procès encore et encore ?

translation.en: To have to read all the lies and the bullshit in the media,
translation.fr: De devoir lire les conneries dans les médias,

translation.en: to have to wear a fucking ankle bracelet 24/7.
translation.fr: de devoir porter un bracelet 24 heures sur 24.

translation.en: - You understand all of that? - I've dealt with clients wrongly accused.
translation.fr: - Vous comprenez ? - J'ai eu des clients accusés à tort.

translation.en: Do not handle me.
Okay. I'll get right to the punchline then.
translation.fr: Bien. Je vais aller droit au but.

translation.en: Jerry Vincent was an excellent attorney.
- I'm better. - So you say.
translation.fr: - Je suis meilleur. - Que vous dites.

translation.en: - So would say Jerry. - Maybe. If he were here, which he is not.
translation.fr: - Jerry le dirait. - S'il était là, peut-être.

translation.en: - I get your frustration. - I asked you not to handle me.
translation.fr: - Je comprends votre frustration. - Pas de ça.

translation.en: Before I consider you, I need to know you'd be ready next week,
translation.fr: Je veux savoir si vous serez prêt pour la semaine prochaine.

translation.en: 'cause I am not pushing this.
Not for another week. Not for another fucking day.
translation.fr: Pas une semaine ni un jour de plus, bordel.

translation.en: - I could be ready. - You're up to speed on the case?
translation.fr: - Je pourrais être prêt. - Vous êtes au jus ?

translation.en: I will be. If I'm not prepared, I'll tell you.
translation.fr: Je vous dirai si je ne suis pas prêt.

translation.en: But I'm confident you won't have to delay the trial.
translation.fr: Mais vous ne repousserez pas le procès.

translation.en: You're confident you have to tell me that to get the job.
translation.fr: Vous me dites ça pour avoir le job.

translation.en: All right.
I need to think about this.
That's a good idea. Have me checked out.
translation.fr: Bonne idée. Cherchez qui je suis.

translation.en: Take your time. Not too much.
The longer you wait,
the greater the chance the judge will push your trial back.
translation.fr: plus le juge risquera de repousser le procès.

translation.en: If you go with me, I'll make sure that won't happen.
translation.fr: Si vous m'embauchez, ça n'arrivera pas.

translation.en: Your sales skills are admirable, I'll give you that.
translation.fr: Vous savez vous vendre, je vous l'accorde.

translation.en: Criminal defense is what I do, Mr. Elliott.
translation.fr: Le droit pénal est ma spécialité, M. Elliott.

translation.en: I do it very well. You have my numbers.
translation.fr: Je suis doué. Vous avez mes numéros.

translation.en: I've lost everything, you understand that, Mickey?
translation.fr: J'ai tout perdu, vous comprenez, Mickey ?

translation.en: My life, my reputation…
worst of all, my wife.
Who I very much did love.
I get it.
You get nothing. Not yet.
You think you just hit the lottery, but I'm telling you… not yet.
translation.fr: Vous croyez avoir touché le jackpot, mais croyez-moi… ce n'est pas fait.

translation.en: Next week? That is impossible.
It was a deal- breaker.
First, let's land him,
then maybe I can talk him into a continuance.
That has to go.
- What? - Nothing.
translation.fr: SI JE L'AVAIS BOUCLÉE, JE NE SERAIS PAS LÀ - Quoi ? - Rien.

translation.en: I'm gonna need a driver.
I need this time to be going over files.
I was thinking maybe Quintero. Is he around?
translation.fr: Je pensais à Quintero. Il est dans le coin ?

translation.en: Still doing time in Corcoran, I heard.
Well, what about Stevie?
Stevie is a terrible driver. Nobody's getting in the car with him.
translation.fr: C'est un mauvais conducteur. Personne ne monte avec lui.

translation.en: All right. Put the word out, will ya?
I'm pulling in. See you in a second.
Jesus. You scared the shit out of me, Cisco.
translation.fr: Bon Dieu. Tu m'as fichu la trouille, Cisco !

translation.en: What the hell are you even doing here, man?
Lorna said you wanted to hire me.
translation.fr: Lorna a dit que tu me demandais.

translation.en: Not for this, Cisco. To work on the Trevor Elliott case.
translation.fr: Pas pour ça. Pour bosser sur l'affaire Trevor Elliott.

translation.en: The police'll handle who killed Jerry Vincent.
You're giving me a heart attack, man.
You could have given me one.
translation.fr: Tu aurais pu m'en filer une.

translation.en: Sorry.
So, Trevor Elliott, huh? That's a big get.
Yeah, if I get him.
I haven't nailed down the gig.
I need to be able to tell him something good.
Something to make him wanna hire me.
translation.fr: pour le convaincre de me choisir.

translation.en: Have you seen the file?
Some. Two dead people. He was at the scene. Not exactly stellar.
translation.fr: En partie. Deux morts. Il était présent. Rien d'extraordinaire.

translation.en: Yeah, well, I gotta offer stellar somehow.
Maybe Maggie can give us some inside baseball on the State's case.
translation.fr: Maggie peut peut-être nous fournir des infos techniques.

translation.en: Oh, shit. Maggie.
Damn it.
You can go, Mom. I'll be fine till he gets here.
translation.fr: Tu peux y aller, maman. Ça ira.

translation.en: I'm not going.
Think I'm okay to be by myself for a half- hour.
translation.fr: Je peux rester seule une demi-heure.

translation.en: The world hasn't gotten that dangerous.
translation.fr: Le monde n'est pas si dangereux.

translation.en: - Not happening. - I'm hoping to have a nice time tonight.
translation.fr: - Pas question. - Je compte passer une bonne soirée.

translation.en: My chances are better if Dad's in a good mood,
translation.fr: Papa doit être de bon poil,

translation.en: and the chances of that are better
if you don't rip him a new one for being 15 minutes late.
translation.fr: si tu ne lui passes pas un savon pour son retard.

translation.en: There he is.
- I'm sorry. - Really?
Hi, Dad.
Sorry.
Sorry, Mags.
- You look good. Sorry. - You gave me your word. 6:00 p.m.
translation.fr: - Tu as bonne mine. Désolé. - Tu avais promis. 18 h.

translation.en: I know.
You really wanna get back to joint custody? Step one--
translation.fr: Tu veux revenir à la garde partagée ? D'abord…

translation.en: Maggie, I'm here now.
How about we deal with you and me later, all right?
translation.fr: Parlons de notre accord plus tard.

translation.en: - I'll pick you up in the morning. - Okay.
- I love you. - Love you, too.
If you're gonna treat me like shit,
have the decency to not look so amazing while doing it.
Hello.
- How are you, baby? You good? - I'm good.
- Ready? Have your bag? - Yeah.
translation.fr: - Prête ? Tu as ton sac ? - Oui.

translation.en: He had a sense what was coming, Jerry.
I don't know.
Well, he files a motion ten days ago.
translation.fr: Il a déposé une requête il y a dix jours.

translation.en: Transfer his practice in case of his death.
translation.fr: Pour léguer son cabinet en cas de mort.

translation.en: Look, let's just focus on Elliott for now, okay?
translation.fr: Concentrons-nous sur Elliott, pour l'instant, d'accord ?

translation.en: Mickey's not really serious about trying this case next week, is he?
translation.fr: Mickey pense vraiment le défendre la semaine prochaine ?

translation.en: Technically, it's nine days. Okay, I said the same thing,
translation.fr: Dans neuf jours, en fait. J'ai dit la même chose,

translation.en: but cases like this don't come around often.
translation.fr: mais des affaires pareilles sont rares.

translation.en: And Mickey needs this. He needs something.
He's okay with… You know?
translation.fr: Ça ne le dérange pas que…

translation.en: - I take it you haven't told him. - I just haven't found the right moment.
translation.fr: - Tu ne lui as rien dit. - L'occasion ne s'est pas présentée.

translation.en: So, you didn't actually go in the water?
translation.fr: Tu n'es pas vraiment allé dans l'eau ?

translation.en: No.
You know that nightmare I have?
It's not so much of me almost drowning,
translation.fr: ce n'est pas d'avoir failli me noyer,

translation.en: it's of you.
Leaving you behind, that's the part that always gets me.
translation.fr: T'abandonner. C'est ce qui me tracasse le plus.

translation.en: - Dad… - What?
You had an accident.
You're not the first surfer it's happened to
and I'm not the first kid to have something bad happen to a parent.
translation.fr: et d'autres enfants ont vu leurs parents en baver.

translation.en: You are tough. You are tough.
translation.fr: Tu es une dure à cuire.

translation.en: Don't get quite as tough as her, okay?
translation.fr: Ne deviens pas aussi dure qu'elle.

translation.en: - I'll try not to. - Well, good.
She's worried about you.
She said that?
She thinks it might be some mid- life thing on top of the pills.
translation.fr: Elle croit à la crise de la quarantaine, en plus des médocs.

translation.en: Is it?
Well, maybe a little.
What do you mean?
Mija, two failed marriages, busted law practice,
translation.fr: Mija, deux mariages ratés, un cabinet qui rame,

translation.en: six months in rehab…
You hit the jackpot with your daughter. Come on…
translation.fr: Tu as touché le gros lot avec ta fille. Allez…

translation.en: When I look back, I always wanted to be a defense lawyer,
translation.fr: J'ai toujours voulu être avocat de la défense,

translation.en: ever since I was a kid watching my dad.
translation.fr: depuis qu'enfant, je regardais mon père.

translation.en: The stuff they teach you in law school, how the system's supposed to work.
translation.fr: Ce qu'ils enseignent en droit, la façon dont le système devrait marcher,

translation.en: You get out there and it's all just muddy.
Everybody's working an angle.
Everybody lies.
After a while you wonder if you're doing any good at all.
translation.fr: On finit par se demander si on fait le bien.

translation.en: You know Mom never feels that way, right? She just puts bad people away.
translation.fr: Maman ne se sent jamais comme ça. Elle met juste les méchants en taule.

translation.en: Your mom's a true believer.
That's what makes her so great at what she does.
translation.fr: C'est pour ça qu'elle est si douée.

translation.en: But you're not?
I was. I think I still am.
translation.fr: J'étais doué. Je crois l'être encore.

translation.en: Look, I believe that in our system, everyone is innocent until proven guilty.
translation.fr: Dans notre système, tout le monde est innocent jusqu'à preuve du contraire.

translation.en: Now, when the State points the finger at you,
translation.fr: Si le ministère public te pointe du doigt,

translation.en: well, I'm all you got.
translation.fr: il ne te reste que moi.

translation.en: Now what?
Are you kidding me?
Sorry to intrude.
This better be good, Detective.
translation.fr: Vaut mieux que ce soit sérieux.

translation.en: It's important.
We really gotta see Jerry Vincent's files.
translation.fr: On doit examiner les dossiers de Jerry Vincent.

translation.en: I realize you have attorney- client privilege.
translation.fr: Il y a le secret professionnel, je sais.

translation.en: DA says you probably have the right to shut us down.
translation.fr: Le procureur dit que vous pouvez l'empêcher.

translation.en: Seriously? I knew this guy.
I really need you to see what we're up against.
translation.fr: Vous devez voir à quoi on fait face.

translation.en: It's a kill shot to the head, very clean.
translation.fr: Balle dans la tête, très propre.

translation.en: Whoever pulled the trigger picked up the shell casings too.
translation.fr: Le tireur a récupéré les douilles.

translation.en: Someone targeted Jerry Vincent
and they didn't take his wallet or his cash.
translation.fr: Il n'a pris ni son portefeuille ni son argent.

translation.en: They took his bag with his laptop.
translation.fr: Juste son sac avec son ordinateur.

translation.en: Now, the question is, what was on there? What did he know that got him killed?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce qu'il contient ? Que savait-il qui lui a valu d'être tué ?

translation.en: If the answer's any place, it's probably in his files.
translation.fr: Les réponses sont certainement dans ses dossiers.

translation.en: I wish I could help you, Detective, I really do.
translation.fr: J'aimerais pouvoir vous aider, inspecteur, vraiment.

translation.en: I'm asking you to help yourself.
You're at risk, Counselor.
You could be next.
Was Jerry involved with wise guys or cartel guys?
translation.fr: Jerry traitait avec des mafieux ou des cartels ?

translation.en: I doubt it, he was straight ahead.
- Ex- prosecutor. - Maybe it's someone he put in prison.
translation.fr: - Ex-procureur. - Quelqu'un qu'il a fait coffrer ?

translation.en: One second.
Yeah, I thought about that. Comb through the files.
translation.fr: J'y ai pensé. Épluche les dossiers.

translation.en: Look for any hint of threats, clients, ex- clients, everybody, all right?
translation.fr: Cherche des preuves de menaces de clients, d'ex-clients, de quiconque.

translation.en: I'm on it.
In the meantime, Elliott gave us access
to his house in Malibu where the murders happened.
translation.fr: à sa maison de Malibu, lieu des meurtres.

translation.en: It's important we get a true picture.
translation.fr: Il nous faut tout le tableau.

translation.en: I'll shoot you the address. Let's meet there around noon.
translation.fr: Je t'envoie l'adresse. Voyons-nous là-bas vers midi.

translation.en: This means we have the case?
Not yet. The more we learn the better our chances.
translation.fr: Pas encore. Plus on en sait, plus on a de chances.

translation.en: - Where are you right now? - Heading into trial.
translation.fr: - Où es-tu ? - Je me rends à un procès.

translation.en: - Oh! Mickey! - Thanks for coming. I appreciate this.
translation.fr: - Mickey ! - Merci d'être venu. C'est gentil.

translation.en: Why wouldn't I?
When the greatest person I ever met asks for my help,
translation.fr: Si la personne la plus géniale demande mon aide,

translation.en: I give my help.
How's Eleanor?
Oh, she's absolutely fantastic is how she is. And she sends her love.
Send my love to her. Thank you.  LA- 292587. People vs. Izzy Letts.
translation.fr: - Embrasse-la pour moi. Merci. - LA-292587. L'État contre Izzy Letts.

translation.en: Be with you in a second.
Mickey Haller, Judge, asks that we approach?
Please tell me you're ready.
- Almost, Judge. - Mr. Haller.
Actually, Judge.
At the risk of further antagonizing Mr. Holt,
translation.fr: au risque de contrarier davantage M. Holt,

translation.en: maybe we call him up for the sidebar?
translation.fr: si on l'appelait pour un aparté ?

translation.en: - Excuse me? - What's going on?
A bit unorthodox, but in the best interests
translation.fr: C'est peu orthodoxe, mais en faveur

translation.en: of judicial economy and justice.
translation.fr: de l'économie et de la justice.

translation.en: Take 30 seconds.
Mr. Holt.
Could you approach the bench?
How you doin'? All right, I'll make this quick.
translation.fr: Ça va ? Bien, je fais vite.

translation.en: My client is charged with grand theft.
translation.fr: Accusation de vol de grande envergure.

translation.en: Which under Section 487 of the Penal Code
translation.fr: Selon la Section 487 du Code pénal,

translation.en: means the value of the stolen object exceeds $950.
translation.fr: la valeur des objets volés doit dépasser 950 $.

translation.en: Your Honor, that necklace is worth what, $400, tops?
translation.fr: Ce collier vaut combien, 400 $, à tout casser ?

translation.en: What?
I've taken few payments in diamonds and gold,
translation.fr: J'ai été payé en diamants et or,

translation.en: developed a pretty good eye.
But to be sure, Judge,
I also brought with me an expert on the matter.
translation.fr: j'ai amené un expert en la matière.

translation.en: That is Marvin Beedleman. He's a jeweler.
He can give us a pretty quick appraisal.
translation.fr: Il peut faire une expertise rapide.

translation.en: The District Attorney might want to get one of her own.
translation.fr: La procureure peut en faire une de son côté.

translation.en: Guessing your wife doesn't know it's a knock- off?
translation.fr: Votre femme ignore que c'est un faux ?

translation.en: I, of course, don't want to upset her.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas la contrarier.

translation.en: Are you kidding me?
I am not. I am not.
Even if it is a knock- off, the defendant thought she was stealing the real thing.
translation.fr: Même si c'est un faux, l'accusée pensait en voler un vrai.

translation.en: You have a witness to testify as to her state of mind?
translation.fr: Vous avez un témoin pour l'affirmer ?

translation.en: Did you not have the necklace appraised?
translation.fr: Le collier n'a pas été estimé ?

translation.en: We have the appraisal from his insurance company.
translation.fr: On a l'estimation de son assurance.

translation.en: Might open up a whole new can of fraud.
I could be wrong, of course.
Miss Shepard, any thoughts on how you might like to play this?
translation.fr: Me Shepard, comment pensez-vous vous y prendre ?

translation.en: Completely dismissed? I get to just go?
translation.fr: Un non-lieu total ? Je peux partir ?

translation.en: Well, unless the DA decides to prosecute the Holts
translation.fr: Sauf si la procureure décide de poursuivre les Holt

translation.en: and you get called as a witness against them,
translation.fr: et que vous deviez témoigner contre eux,

translation.en: but I don't think that'll happen.
Oh, my God.
Didn't even have to get up there
translation.fr: Même pas eu besoin de dire

translation.en: and testify as to what a nice person you are.
translation.fr: que vous êtes une bonne personne.

translation.en: I don't know how to thank you. I will pay you one day, I promise.
translation.fr: Comment vous remercier ? Je vous paierai un jour, promis.

translation.en: You pay me now.
I'm broke. I don't have a nickel to my name.
translation.fr: Je suis fauchée. Pas un rond.

translation.en: Have a driver's license?
Excuse me?
What do you mean you hired her?
I told you I needed a driver, and she can drive.
translation.fr: Il me fallait un chauffeur, elle sait conduire.

translation.en: I'm actually a good driver.
She's actually a good driver, Lorna.
It wouldn't kill you to work from an office.
translation.fr: Tu pourrais bosser d'un bureau. Trop structuré.

translation.en: Too much structure. I gotta work while I'm on the move.
translation.fr: Trop structuré. Je dois bosser en mouvement.

translation.en: - Didn't you say she's an addict? - Former. Who am I to judge? Turn right.
translation.fr: - Elle est toxico ? - Était. Qui suis-je pour juger ? Droite.

translation.en: I'm almost there. Call you back.
Mickey, no--
- Maggie. - Hi, Lorna. Nice to see you.
translation.fr: - Maggie. - Bonjour, Lorna. Ravie de te voir.

translation.en: Um, thank you, and likewise. You look pretty.
translation.fr: Merci, moi aussi. Tu es en beauté.

translation.en: Something I can help you with?
We both care for him, Lorna.
translation.fr: On tient toutes deux à lui, Lorna.

translation.en: And I mean, I'm happy
for all this positive turn of events for Mickey…
translation.fr: que les choses s'arrangent pour Mickey…

translation.en: But?
But taking over a high- profile murder for a lawyer who was just gunned down
translation.fr: Reprendre un meurtre médiatisé pour un avocat qui s'est fait buter

translation.en: for God knows what reason, do we really think this is a good idea?
translation.fr: pour Dieu sait quelle raison, est-ce une bonne idée ?

translation.en: The wolf is at the door, Maggie.
I have been holding his practice together with string and glue.
translation.fr: Je fais tout mon possible pour faire tourner son cabinet.

translation.en: His life is bigger than just his law career.
translation.fr: Sa vie ne s'arrête pas à sa carrière.

translation.en: He needs to get back on his feet first. His daughter needs him back on his feet.
translation.fr: Il doit remonter la pente. Sa fille en a besoin.

translation.en: I know, and this could be the thing that gets him there.
translation.fr: Je sais, et il pourrait y arriver grâce à ça.

translation.en: For the first time in a year, he's alive again.
translation.fr: Pour la première fois en un an, il revit.

translation.en: And you know Mickey.
The only thing he likes more than a fight
translation.fr: Tout ce qu'il aime plus qu'un combat,

translation.en: is a fight with one hand tied behind his back.
translation.fr: c'est un combat avec une main dans le dos.

translation.en: I'll be about 15 minutes.
Sounds good.
Welcome to the jungle.
Remind me. We're never bringing the jury here.
They'll hate this guy and we're doomed.
translation.fr: Il le détestera, et on sera fichus.

translation.en: Wife was there on the bed.
translation.fr: Sa femme était sur le lit.

translation.en: Boyfriend there on the floor.
Police think Elliott stood at the door. Maybe watching them fuck--
translation.fr: La police pense qu'Elliott se tenait à la porte, qu'il les a regardés bais…

translation.en: Fornicate for a while before he came in and shot 'em.
translation.fr: Forniquer un moment, avant d'entrer et de les tuer.

translation.en: Murder weapon was never found.
Probably out there in the ocean.
translation.fr: Elle est sans doute dans l'océan.

translation.en: I don't know, Mick. You're good, but this good?
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas. Tu es fort, mais à ce point ?

translation.en: If they could place Elliott here.
Motive all over. Positive gunshot residue.
Has he given you his story?
Hey, listen, there's something else.
translation.fr: Écoute voir. J'ai un truc à te dire.

translation.en: What?
I know you're okay with me seeing Lorna and shit.
translation.fr: Je sais que ça ne te gêne pas que je voie Lorna.

translation.en: At least you say you're okay with it.
translation.fr: Ou tu le dis, en tout cas.

translation.en: Lorna's been meaning to tell you when the time is right,
translation.fr: Lorna comptait te le dire au bon moment,

translation.en: but somehow,
I suspect the time might never be right for her,
translation.fr: que ça ne sera jamais le bon moment pour elle,

translation.en: so I'm just gonna say it.
Me and Lorna,
we're gonna get married.
What do you mean, Ah? What is Ah? Is it okay with you?
translation.fr: Comment ça, Ah ? Ça veut dire quoi ? Ça te va ?

translation.en: I'm not part of the equation, Cisco.
translation.fr: Je ne fais pas partie de l'équation.

translation.en: But I wanna know, is it okay with you?
translation.fr: Mais est-ce que ça te va ?

translation.en: Do you love her?
With all my heart.
Then it's all right with me.
But I'll tell you, Cisco.
She's one of the four most important people in my life.
translation.fr: c'est une des quatre personnes essentielles pour moi.

translation.en: - Should you ever hurt her-- - Of course I would never.
translation.fr: - Si tu lui fais du mal… - Jamais de la vie.

translation.en: She's the greatest thing ever.
Who's the fourth?
What?
You said four people.
Hayley, Maggie, Lorna and--
Who's the fourth?
Yes, uh… Yes, I'll be there.
Trevor Elliott has summoned me.
You checked out well.
High- performing trial lawyer, much better than Jerry according to most.
translation.fr: Avocat très compétent, bien meilleur que Jerry d'après beaucoup.

translation.en: Until you went off the deep end and became a drug addict.
translation.fr: Jusqu'à ce que vous dérapiez et deveniez toxico.

translation.en: I'm not an addict now.
Listen, Mickey. The thing about this case,
translation.fr: Écoutez, Mickey. Pour ce qui est de cette affaire,

translation.en: I need to win it in court
translation.fr: je dois la remporter au tribunal

translation.en: and I need to win in the court of public opinion.
The world is quick to cancel these days.
translation.fr: Le monde vous tourne vite le dos.

translation.en: Just take a look at my Twitter feed.
translation.fr: Y a qu'à voir mon fil Twitter.

translation.en: I need a lawyer who can get me my freedom back
translation.fr: Il me faut un avocat qui me rende ma liberté

translation.en: and my name back.
Are you that lawyer?
No.
No, all I can do is get you a Not guilty.
translation.fr: Je peux vous obtenir un non coupable.

translation.en: I can't deliver you a finding of innocent.
The courts don't work that way. Not guilty, best I can do.
translation.fr: Ça ne marche pas comme ça. Je ne peux pas faire mieux.

translation.en: And you can get that? For sure?
translation.fr: Et vous pouvez l'obtenir ? C'est sûr ?

translation.en: Depends on what I have to work with.
translation.fr: Ça dépend de ce dont je dispose.

translation.en: - I didn't kill them. - I didn't ask you.
But I need you to know, I didn't.
translation.fr: Sachez-le, je ne les ai pas tués.

translation.en: All right, here's the deal, Trevor.
translation.fr: Bien, voilà ce qu'il en est.

translation.en: I can win almost any case as long as I know what I'm dealing with.
translation.fr: Je remporte presque tous les procès si je sais à quoi j'ai affaire.

translation.en: Right now, I don't.
So you lie to me,
I don't want your case, however much I might need it.
translation.fr: je lâche votre affaire, même si j'en ai besoin.

translation.en: Okay.
I was as far from cool as you can get in high school.
translation.fr: J'étais loin d'être cool au lycée.

translation.en: Girls wouldn't give me the time of day, but I could always talk to Zelda.
translation.fr: Les filles m'ignoraient, mais je pouvais toujours parler à Zelda.

translation.en: Real life sucked.
But video games, they mattered.
translation.fr: Mais les jeux vidéo, c'était tout.

translation.en: Then I met Lara.
She was different. She was beautiful, she was brilliant.
translation.fr: Elle était différente. Elle était belle, brillante.

translation.en: And she loved me.
We're just out of grad school, the game industry was exploding.
translation.fr: Quand on a fini la fac, l'industrie du jeu explosait.

translation.en: But the problem that nobody could get around was the uncanny valley.
translation.fr: Mais personne n'arrivait à résoudre le problème de la vallée de l'étrange.

translation.en: Uncanny what?
If you're trying to make something humanlike,
translation.fr: Si on crée quelque chose d'humanoïde,

translation.en: the human brain will reject it unless it's almost perfect.
translation.fr: le cerveau le rejette s'il n'est pas quasi parfait.

translation.en: You know, video game characters were close to real,
translation.fr: Les personnages des jeux étaient presque réels,

translation.en: but not close enough.
Especially in the eyes, the eyes always gave it away.
But the closer the characters resemble us,
the more connection we feel, the more we wanna play.
translation.fr: plus on sent un lien, plus on veut jouer.

translation.en: That's the uncanny valley. And I was the one who crossed it.
translation.fr: C'est la vallée de l'étrange. C'est moi qui l'ai traversée.

translation.en: Working out of my garage.
One script, maybe 100 lines of code,
translation.fr: Un script, une centaine de lignes de code,

translation.en: changed everything.
The girl in the game.
That was our first big hit.
It's what put us on the map.
And, yes, I modeled the character after Lara.
translation.fr: Et oui, le personnage s'inspirait de Lara.

translation.en: It's fair to say that her DNA
translation.fr: On peut dire que son ADN

translation.en: is in everything this company has ever done.
translation.fr: est dans tout ce que cette société a fait.

translation.en: We were a team.
I didn't know she was cheating on me.
Looking back at it, I was working all the time,
translation.fr: Après tout, je bossais sans arrêt,

translation.en: I was traveling too much, and she grew resentful.
translation.fr: je voyageais trop, et elle est devenue aigrie.

translation.en: Angry.
I went out to the house that day to surprise her.
translation.fr: J'étais rentré pour lui faire une surprise.

translation.en: And instead…
I will never get that out of my head as long as I live.
translation.fr: Je ne me sortirai jamais ça de la tête.

translation.en: I found her like that. My own wife. My best friend.
translation.fr: Je l'ai trouvée comme ça. Ma femme. Ma meilleure amie.

translation.en: And that fucking yoga instructor.
translation.fr: Et ce putain de prof de yoga.

translation.en: And everyone thinks I killed her,
translation.fr: On croit que je l'ai tuée,

translation.en: but the truth is if I had found them alive,
translation.fr: mais si je les avais trouvés en vie,

translation.en: I wouldn't even have left her.
I would have begged her to come back to me because I need her.
translation.fr: Je l'aurais suppliée de me revenir, car j'ai besoin d'elle.

translation.en: People say I'm a genius. The code I wrote, they call it magic.
translation.fr: On dit que je suis un génie. Que mon code est magique.

translation.en: Lara was the magic. She was the inspiration.
translation.fr: C'est Lara qui était magique. Elle m'inspirait.

translation.en: Without her, I would still be sitting in my garage.
translation.fr: Sans elle, je serais encore dans mon garage.

translation.en: I never could have killed her
because without her…
I have no magic.
That's what you're dealing with. Can you work with that?
translation.fr: Voilà ce qu'il en est. Vous pouvez gérer avec ça ?

translation.en: I can win with that.
- You can win with that? - I can.
- You can win with that next week? - I can.
Then you're hired.
- Well? - We got it.
- We got the case? - Lots of work to do, Lorna.
translation.fr: - On a l'affaire ? - On doit trimer.

translation.en: - We need to keep our heads. - Oh, my God.
translation.fr: - Gardons la tête froide. - Mon Dieu.

translation.en: Lots of work. Tell Cisco to meet me at the office.
translation.fr: Dis à Cisco de me rejoindre au cabinet.

translation.en: See you in a few.
You okay?
Your eyes look like they're about to cry.
translation.fr: Vous avez les larmes aux yeux.

translation.en: Uh, just allergies.
Your eyes should be on the road, by the way.
You really okay?
Never been better. Take the turn up here, will you?
translation.fr: On ne peut mieux. Tournez ici.

translation.en: What? Is something wrong?
Yeah, we're being followed.
